snippet: As the battle over Senate confirmations during recesses moves to the Supreme Court, a tale is developing with a remarkable number of twists and turns.
abstract: Meaning of a Senate recess is just one of the issues as the fight over Pres Obama's recess appointment moves to the Supreme Court; fight against Obama's appointments involves three conservative lawyers, all of whom occupied positions in government under Republican presidents who appointed them during Senate recesses.
lead_paragraph: As the battle over Senate confirmations during recesses moves to the Supreme Court, a tale is developing with a remarkable number of twists and turns.

headline.main: Role Reversals Emerge in Dispute Over Obama’s Recess Appointments
